strings.Value: [Leave the party] "Still I have to go."
[Stay at the party] "Clear as day! I just wanted a break from the noise."
"Linzi, I think now's the perfect time for one of your performances."
"Come to think of it, no. Give me a little more time."
"Thank you for the wonderful idea, Linzi."
"Isn't it hard to play and talk at the same time?"
{n}Linzi looks up at you, surprised, trying to keep the rhythm.{/n} "Where are you going? If you... leave now... the whole plan... goes to pieces!"
"Are you sure? Have you had time to talk to everyone?"
{n}Linzi runs her fingers over the strings intently.{/n} "Hmm?"
{n}Linzi's face brightens.{/n} "I'm glad you liked it! I hope the others... are happy too! Especially... Ekun..."
